name: console_input_clear
comment: clears console input buffer

name: console_input_buffer
comment: returns console input buffer pointer

name: console_input_poll
comment: polls text input and updates console buffer

name: console_push_line
comment: pushes line into console queue

name: console_printf
comment: formats then pushes line

name: console_register_command
comment: registers a console command and handler

name: console_flush_log
comment: flushes console lines to the log file

name: register_core_cvars
comment: registers built-in cvars

name: ui_mouse_inside_rect
signature: int ui_mouse_inside_rect(float *xy, int h, int w)
comment: returns 1 when the mouse is inside the rect and mouse capture is clear

name: perks_generate_choices
comment: builds the current perk choice list

name: demo_trial_overlay_render
comment: renders the demo trial warning panel and remaining time message

name: perk_apply
comment: applies perk effects and increments perk counter

name: gameplay_render_world
comment: world render pass: updates gameplay fade and draws fx queue, creatures, players, projectiles, bonuses

name: survival_spawn_creature
comment: spawns a creature at the given position, selecting type/stats based on DAT_0049095c

name: survival_update
comment: main survival mode update: timers, scripted spawns, and enemy wave spawning

name: tutorial_prompt_dialog
comment: renders tutorial prompt text + Repeat/Play/Skip buttons and handles selections

name: tutorial_timeline_update
comment: drives tutorial stage timing, messages, and scripted spawns

name: bonus_apply
comment: applies a picked bonus to the player and spawns related effects

name: bonus_update
comment: updates bonus lifetimes and handles player pickups

name: demo_purchase_screen_update
comment: demo upsell screen: feature list, purchase link, and exit handling

name: quest_results_screen_update
comment: quest/campaign results screen: final time, perk bonus, high score entry, and buttons

name: game_mode_label
comment: returns a display label for the current game mode

name: game_sequence_load
comment: reads the sequence value from registry

name: game_save_status
comment: writes registry state and saves status file

name: game_load_status
comment: loads status file; regenerates on failure

name: player_update
comment: per-player gameplay update: movement, firing, status timers, and effects

name: terrain_generate
comment: generates terrain texture into a render target using a level descriptor

name: creature_render_type
comment: renders active creatures matching type_id using 8x8 atlases and animation strips

name: creature_render_all
comment: creature render pass: overlays + per-type draws via creature_render_type

name: ui_cursor_render
comment: renders the in-game cursor/crosshair sprites

name: ui_elements_update_and_render
comment: advances UI timeline, handles transitions, updates + renders all UI elements

name: ui_render_hud
comment: renders the in-game HUD (health, weapon icons, player UI)

comment: pushes a quad entry into DAT_004aaf18 (capped at 0x80); returns 1 on success
